hadith.chapterTitle: Etiquette of Attending company and sitting with Companions
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "If someone leaves his seat (for one reason or another) and returns to it, he is better entitled to it."

[Muslim].
- وعن أبى هريرة رضى الله عنه أن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم قال‏:‏ ‏"‏إذا قام أحدكم من مجلس، ثم رجع إليه، فهو أحق به‏"‏. ((رواه مسلم)).
